verses.roman:
prabhu kahena,--"govinda, tumi ihāṅi rahibā
paṇḍita bhojana kaile, āmāre kahibā"

synonyms: prabhu kahena—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; govinda—Govinda; tumi—you; ihāṅi rahibā—will stay here; paṇḍita—Jagadānanda Paṇḍita; bhojana kaile—after he has taken his meal; āmāre kahibā—you should inform Me.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then told Govinda, "You remain here. When the Paṇḍita has taken his food, come inform Me.
